title: Cancel a Hotel Reservation
description: A customer needs to cancel their upcoming hotel reservation.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's reservation using their confirmation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates the specified reservation.

tasks.description: Check the cancellation policy to determine if a refund is applicable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the reservation is within the free cancellation window.

tasks.description: Process the cancellation and inform the customer about the refund process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the booking and provides a cancellation number.
